issue.message: getToken() called without defining onTokenRefresh callback.
issue.summary: Missing Firebase Instance ID Token Refresh
issue.explanation: Apps that check the Firebase Instance ID should usually implement the FirebaseInstanceIdService#onTokenRefresh() callback in order to observe changes.

issue.message: Exported service does not require permission
issue.summary: Exported service does not require permission
issue.explanation: Exported services (services which either set `exported=true` or contain an intent-filter and do not specify `exported=false`) should define a permission that an entity must have in order to launch the service or bind to it. Without this, any application can use this service.
